data.name: Galaxy Control: 3D Strategy
data.detailed_description:
Steam FAQ

QUESTION: Free-to-Play game? Another one?!
ANSWER: Yes, this is a F2P game. We’re honest about it. There is no paywall, no artificial barriers. Everyone is in same conditions if they pay or not. If you like to support developers and grow faster (but not bigger!) in the process — you can donate. But this is completely voluntary!
Q: WTF? Timers?!
A: Yes, many things in our game are time dependent. This is a way to balance a massive multiplayer game and to make players return to game regularly. This may be a bit strange for desktop game, but mobile games been using it for years.
Q: Can I play on mobile?
A: Galaxy Control is already available on all mobile platforms:
- iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/galaxy-control-3d-strategy/id835092690
- Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=gl.fx.galaxycontrol
- Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/FX-Games-Galaxy-Control-strategy/dp/B00LHZB97U
- Windows Phone: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/galaxy-control/9wzdncrdbv2p
Q: Why do we need a Steam version?
A: We have a lot of fans who prefer playing (or continue playing) on PC and Mac in Facebook version, meanwhile many browsers limiting support of 3D games recently. So we do this for their convenience first of all. We're determined to develop Steam version and hope that many new players will join the game!
Q: Will I be able to play on the same account from Steam and from mobile?
A: Absolutely! We support connecting Steam accounts to mobile (and vice-versa) through Facebook.
Q: Are Steam players playing on the same server as mobile users?
A: Everyone is playing on the same server. There are already hundreds of thousands of players in Galaxy Control!


About the Game

Galaxy Control is an ultimate space combat strategy game with fast-paced combats!

Build your base and battle with other players to control the galaxy! Galaxy Control is an ultimate space combat strategy game with next generation 3d graphics and fast-paced combats!

Gather minerals and extract uranium, defend your base with laser towers, missile turrets, cannons, walls and mines, create the ultimate army with unique ground and air units! Battle with millions of players and take their Fame point and resources! Became the TOP 1 in the galaxy!

NOTE! Galaxy Control requires internet connection.

FEATURES:

- 100% FREE TO PLAY ultimate space strategy
- Battle with players from all over the world and take their Fame Points and resources
- Gather minerals and extract uranium to build and upgrade your base
- Defend your base with laser towers, missile turrets, cannons, walls and mines
- Create the ultimate army with more than 11 unique ground and air units
- Campaign Mode with more than 100 unique missions
